name: Suicidal Thoughts
description:
Suicidal Thoughts is a game made to bring awareness to mental health. You play as Clay a character suffering from depression due to his troubled past. 

How to play: 

Using A, D & spacebar to control the player and jump 

System requirements: 

CPU: i5-3470 3.20Ghz

RAM: 8GB

OS: Windows 7 & above
